punktiert.physics
Class VPhysics

java.lang.Object
  punktiert.physics.VPhysicsSimple
      punktiert.physics.VPhysics

public class VPhysics
extends VPhysicsSimple

A particle physics engine using Verlet integration

based on: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verlet_integration http://www.teknikus.dk/tj/gdc2001.htm

this class is more or less an modification/ extension of Karsten Schmidt's toxi.physics.VerletPhysics class, http://toxiclibs.org ;

for convenience combined physics for 2D / 3D; some addons for speed; and extended behaviors

Written by Daniel Koehler - 2012 www.lab-eds.org for feedback please contact me at: daniel@lab-eds.org

          Initializes an Verlet engine instance
VPhysics(float neighborRange)
          default neighborRange = 80; define this val, if your scene uses any bigger or extremely smaller influence radius for local neighbor sets

          Initializes an Verlet engine instance with bounding box, by default min Corner == zero; bouncing space
